name: Zac to Ombra: Maboroshi no Yuuenchi
name_original: Zac to Ombra: Maboroshi no Yuuenchi
description:
Zac to Ombra: Maboroshi no Yuuenchi is an adventure-puzzle game developed by Konami Digital Entertainment. It came out on 28-10-2010. Konami published the game.
Zac to Ombra: Maboroshi no Yuuenchi is available on Nintendo DS.
